meta.description: An implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name Specifications

license.fullName: GNU Library General Public License v2 or later

meta.long_description:
libcanberra is an implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name
Specifications, for generating event sounds on free desktops
such as GNOME.  It comes with several backends (ALSA,
PulseAudio, OSS, GStreamer, null) and is designed to be
portable.
meta.name: libcanberra
